ok, then the problem is that you have a) too many unneccessary packages installed or b) too many random files. if you do the command df -h, you can see just how much space you have left
one thing you could do is archive rarely-accessed files
another is delete things you no longer use
you might also run the command sudo apt-get autoclean to free some space
